channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report X-2023100484
item.description:
Report X-2023100484

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-06
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: WEARING FULL PPE AND FOLLOWING DECISION TREE AND FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET, RESPONDER RESPONDED TO BELT, PLACED PACKAGE IN LINED SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO PROCESSING CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023100423
item.description:
Report X-2023100423

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: WEARING FULL PPE AND FOLLOWING DECISION TREE RESPONDED TO TENDER STATION, RESPONDER PLACED PACKAGE IN LINED SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO PROCESSING CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON INSPECTION OF CONTENTS, DISCOVERED HIGH VOLUME HYDROGEN PEROXIDE, RESPONDER SAW NO INDICATIONS OF HAZARDOUS MATERIALS PRESENT. HMSC CONFIRMED UNDECLARED STATUS. RESPONDER FOLLOWED UNDECLARED PROTOCOL.

item.title: Report X-2023100392
item.description:
Report X-2023100392

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-07T18:15:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-29
  • City: OREM
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED OUT TO A SPILL ON THE IRREG SLIDE. 5 GALLON BUCKET WAS LEAKING A SMALL AMOUNT OF CLEAR LIQUID FROM IT'S SIDE. BUCKET WAS PLACED INTO A LINED SPILL TRAY AND TRASPORTED TO THE DMP AREA FOR PROCESSING.
